Event.Message: WPD device installation function (%1, %2) begin.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InstallFunctionCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InstallFunctionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: WPD device installation function (%1, %2) end with this return code (%3).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InstallFunctionCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InstallFunctionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ReturnCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: WPD device metadata retrieval for device %1 begin
WPD device metadata retrieval for device %1 end with this return code (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ReturnCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: WPD device metadata retrieval for device %1 begin
WPD device metadata retrieval for device %1 end with this return code (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ReturnCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Device marked for reinstallation on subsequent connect.
%1: Transfer of metadata (%2, %3) succeeded.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataLocaleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataContentId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1: Transfer of metadata (%2, %3) skipped. Error code %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataLocaleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataContentId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ReturnCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1: Transfer of metadata (%2, %3) failed. Error code %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataLocaleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataContentId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ReturnCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1: Transfer of metadata failed as the Device Metadata Service could not be accessed. Error code %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ReturnCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1: Successfully opened the Device Metadata Service to retrieve metadata: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DevicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ServicePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Transfer of metadata (%1, %2) is skipped because the metadata already exists on the system.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MetadataLocaleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MetadataContentId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Drivers were successfully installed for device %1.
Media player and imaging program compatibility layers were successfully registered for device %1. Layer bits %2 were requested, layer bits %3 were registered.
Autoplay was successfully registered for device %1.
Autoplay registration was skipped for device %1.
%1: Drivers for %2 device(s) were successfully uninstalled while migrating a dual-mode mass storage class device to Media Transfer Protocol (MTP).
%1: Drivers for %2 device(s) were successfully uninstalled while migrating a Media Transfer Protocol (MTP) device.
%1: Drivers for %2 device(s) were successfully uninstalled while migrating a Media Transfer Protocol (MTP) device, including any devices that were connected and active.
%1: Drivers for %2 device(s) were successfully uninstalled while migrating a Picture Transfer Protocol (PTP) device.
%1: Drivers for %2 device(s) were successfully uninstalled while migrating a Picture Transfer Protocol (PTP) device, including any devices that were connected and active.
%1: Drivers were successfully migrated after Plug and Play was enumerated again.
%1: This version of Windows does not support Windows Portable Device drivers, so the drivers were not installed.
It was not possible to install drivers for the device %1. Error code %2.
It was not possible to access the device (%1) after installing drivers. Error code %2.
It was not possible to register media player and imaging program layers for the device %1. Error code %2.
It was not possible to register autoplay for device %1. Error code %2.
%1 failed to uninstall drivers when migrating dual-mode devices from mass storage class to Media Transfer Protocol (MTP). Error code %2.
%1 failed to uninstall drivers for single-protocol Media Transfer Protocol (MTP) devices. Error %2.
%1 failed to uninstall drivers for single-protocol Picture Transfer Protocol (PTP) devices. Error %2.
%1: It was not possible to enumerate Plug and Play again after drivers were migrated. Error code %2.
